from pprint import pprint

import yaml
from nbdev import test_fail
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

DataFreq[source]

Enum = [B, C, D, W, M, SM, BM, CBM, MS, SMS, BMS, CBMS, Q, BQ, QS, BQS, A, Y, BA, BY, AS, YS, BAS, BYS, BH, H, T, S, L, U, N, W_MON, W_TUE, W_WED, W_THU, W_FRI, W_SAT, Q_JAN, Q_FEB, Q_MAR, Q_APR, Q_MAY, Q_JUN, Q_JUL, Q_AUG, Q_SEP, Q_OCT, Q_NOV, A_JAN, A_FEB, A_MAR, A_APR, A_MAY, A_JUN, A_JUL, A_AUG, A_SEP, A_OCT, A_NOV]

Pandas frequencies.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

DataFormat[source]

Enum = [csv, parquet]

Allowed data formats.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class DataConfig[source]

DataConfig(prefix:str, input:str, output:str, format:DataFormat, dynamic:List[str]=None) :: BaseModel

Data configuration.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class BacktestConfig[source]

BacktestConfig(n_windows:int, window_size:int) :: BaseModel

Backtest configuration.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class FeaturesConfig[source]

FeaturesConfig(freq:DataFreq, lags:List[int]=None, lag_transforms:Dict[int, List[Union[Literal[rolling_mean, rolling_std, rolling_max, rolling_min, seasonal_rolling_mean, seasonal_rolling_std, seasonal_rolling_max, seasonal_rolling_min, expanding_mean, expanding_std, expanding_max, expanding_min, seasonal_expanding_mean, seasonal_expanding_std, seasonal_expanding_min, seasonal_expanding_max, ewm_mean], Dict[Literal[rolling_mean, rolling_std, rolling_max, rolling_min, seasonal_rolling_mean, seasonal_rolling_std, seasonal_rolling_max, seasonal_rolling_min, expanding_mean, expanding_std, expanding_max, expanding_min, seasonal_expanding_mean, seasonal_expanding_std, seasonal_expanding_min, seasonal_expanding_max, ewm_mean], Dict[KT, VT]]]]]=None, date_features:List[Literal[year, month, day, hour, minute, second, dayofyear, day_of_year, weekofyear, week, dayofweek, day_of_week, weekday, quarter, daysinmonth, is_month_start, is_month_end, is_quarter_start, is_quarter_end, is_year_start, is_year_end]]=None, static_features:List[str]=None, keep_last_n:int=None, num_threads:int=None) :: BaseModel

Features configuration.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class ForecastConfig[source]

ForecastConfig(horizon:int) :: BaseModel

Forecast configuration.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class ModelConfig[source]

ModelConfig(name:str, params:Dict[KT, VT]=None) :: BaseModel

Model configuration.

name must include the modules i.e. sklearn.ensemble.RandomForestRegressor.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class LocalConfig[source]

LocalConfig(model:ModelConfig) :: BaseModel

Configuration for local pipeline.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class ClusterConfig[source]

ClusterConfig(class_name:str, class_kwargs:Dict[KT, VT]) :: BaseModel

Cluter configuration.

class_name must include the modules i.e. dask.distributed.LocalCluster

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

DistributedModelName[source]

Enum = [XGBForecast, LGBMForecast]

Available models for distributed training.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class DistributedModelConfig[source]

DistributedModelConfig(name:DistributedModelName, params:Dict[KT, VT]=None) :: BaseModel

Configuration for distributed models.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class DistributedConfig[source]

DistributedConfig(model:DistributedModelConfig, cluster:ClusterConfig) :: BaseModel

Configuration for distributed training.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class FlowConfig[source]

FlowConfig(data:DataConfig, features:FeaturesConfig, backtest:BacktestConfig=None, forecast:ForecastConfig=None, local:LocalConfig=None, distributed:DistributedConfig=None) :: BaseModel

Flow configuration.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
with open('../sample_configs/local.yaml', 'r') as f:
    config = FlowConfig(**yaml.safe_load(f))
pprint(config.dict())

{'backtest': {'n_windows': 2, 'window_size': 7},
 'data': {'dynamic': None,
          'format': <DataFormat.parquet: 'parquet'>,
          'input': 'train',
          'output': 'outputs',
          'prefix': 'data'},
 'distributed': None,
 'features': {'date_features': ['dayofweek', 'month', 'year'],
              'freq': <DataFreq.D: 'D'>,
              'keep_last_n': None,
              'lag_transforms': {1: ['expanding_mean'],
                                 7: [{'rolling_mean': {'window_size': 7}},
                                     {'rolling_mean': {'window_size': 14}}]},
              'lags': [7, 14],
              'num_threads': 2,
              'static_features': None},
 'forecast': {'horizon': 7},
 'local': {'model': {'name': 'sklearn.ensemble.RandomForestRegressor',
                     'params': {'max_depth': 7, 'n_estimators': 10}}}}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
with open('../sample_configs/distributed.yaml', 'r') as f:
    config = FlowConfig(**yaml.safe_load(f))
pprint(config.dict())

{'backtest': {'n_windows': 2, 'window_size': 7},
 'data': {'dynamic': None,
          'format': <DataFormat.parquet: 'parquet'>,
          'input': 'train',
          'output': 'outputs',
          'prefix': 'data'},
 'distributed': {'cluster': {'class_kwargs': {'memory_limit': '4 GiB',
                                              'n_workers': 2,
                                              'threads_per_worker': 2},
                             'class_name': 'dask.distributed.LocalCluster'},
                 'model': {'name': <DistributedModelName.LGBMForecast: 'LGBMForecast'>,
                           'params': {'eta': 0.3, 'max_depth': 7}}},
 'features': {'date_features': ['dayofweek', 'month', 'year'],
              'freq': <DataFreq.D: 'D'>,
              'keep_last_n': None,
              'lag_transforms': {1: ['expanding_mean'],
                                 7: [{'rolling_mean': {'window_size': 7}},
                                     {'rolling_min': {'window_size': 7}}]},
              'lags': [7, 14],
              'num_threads': 2,
              'static_features': None},
 'forecast': {'horizon': 7},
 'local': None}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
with open('../sample_configs/distributed.yaml', 'r') as f:
    cfg = yaml.safe_load(f)

def test_specifying_both_local_and_distributed_fails():
    cfg['local'] = {'model': {'name': 'lgb.LGBMRegressor'}}
    FlowConfig(**cfg)
    
test_fail(test_specifying_both_local_and_distributed_fails, contains='not both')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
with open('../sample_configs/distributed.yaml', 'r') as f:
    cfg = yaml.safe_load(f)

def test_not_specifying_local_nor_distributed_fails():
    del cfg['distributed']
    FlowConfig(**cfg)
    
test_fail(test_not_specifying_local_nor_distributed_fails, contains='either local or distributed')
{% endraw %}
